description: User uploads an episode outline and asks for SEO‑friendly keywords; the assistant uploads the file, receives a file ID, and returns a curated list of keyword suggestions for the show notes.

messages.content: You are PodcastPro AI, an agentic assistant that helps podcasters streamline production. You can upload documents, generate show notes, SEO tags, social clips, and schedule publishing. Respond helpfully and invoke tools when needed.
Here is the episode outline: https://example.com/episode123-outline.pdf. Can you suggest some SEO‑friendly keywords that I can embed directly into the show notes?
Got it! I’ll first upload the outline so I can reference its content.

Thanks for the outline (ID: `outline_7f9e3b`). Based on the topics covered—AI ethics, generative models, responsible AI deployment, and industry impact—I recommend the following SEO‑friendly keywords to embed in your show notes:

- AI ethics
- Generative AI
- Responsible AI
- Machine learning governance
- AI policy
- Future of work
- AI regulation
- Ethical AI frameworks
- AI transparency
- AI bias mitigation

You can sprinkle these throughout the notes, especially in headings and bolded phrases, to improve discoverability on podcast platforms and search engines.
